Review Name: Wonderful Review Description: just writing the review after 2 days. might be too early to tell.. excellent delivery by Flipkart. next day installation scheduled and that went very smooth. AC is working very nice and Himalayan cool feature is the added advantage. design wise very elegant and feature rich AC. I would say go for it this is the best AC available in market . little costlier but worth having it.
